import { useState } from "react"; import "./Register.scss"; const Register = () => { const [input, setInput] = useState({ username: "", email: "", password: "", confirmPassword: "" }) const handleChange = (e) => { setInput({...input, [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } return (

Registration

handleChange(e)} /> User name must be between 3-16 characters
handleChange(e)} /> Valid email is required
handleChange(e)} /> Password must be between 6-20 characters
handleChange(e)} /> Confirm password is wrong
); }; export default Register;
